text: (napiye!) ‘‘Vanankalaiyum pumiyaiyum pataittavan yar?'' Enru nir avarkalaik ketpirayin, atarkavarkal ‘‘allahtan'' enru niccayamakak kuruvarkal. (Atarku, ‘‘ivvalavenum unkalukku arivu iruppatu parri) allahvai nan pukalkiren'' enru nir kuruviraka. Eninum, avarkalil perumpalanavarkal (iraivanai ivvaru pukalntu tuti ceyya) ariya mattarkal
